events.message: I just received my order and the laptop screen is cracked and unusable. I need help with this urgently.
The issue has been categorized as a Product Defect due to the cracked screen reported by the customer.
Support agent Mike has been assigned to assist with the cracked laptop screen case.
Hello, I'm Mike from support. I'm sorry to hear about the cracked screen on your laptop. Let's work on resolving this.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and your order number so I can verify the details?
I have attached the pictures of the broken screen and my order ID is 67890. This is very disappointing.
Thank you for the photos. We can either arrange a replacement laptop or offer a full refund. Please let me know your preference.
I would prefer to get a replacement laptop as soon as possible. Thanks for the quick help.
We have processed the replacement order and it will be shipped out within 2 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement laptop and that it is functioning correctly.
Yes, I got the replacement laptop yesterday and everything is perfect now. Thank you for your support.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your recent support experience. Your feedback is appreciated.
I completed the survey and rated the experience as excellent. Thanks again for the quick resolution.
The case has been formally closed following the successful replacement and positive customer feedback.
The customer support case regarding the cracked laptop screen has been archived for record keeping.
